ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Ashok Khanal has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 6 years. Currently she is employed as a Sr. Java Developer at Citizens Bank. Ashok has extensive knowledge of Struts Web Application Framework, Java Server Pages, Hibernate, Java 2 Enterprise Edition, HTML, Java Servlets, JavaScript, Enterprise Java Beans, Cascading Style Sheets, AJAX, XML, Java, WebLogic Enterprise Application Server, Spring Framework, JDBC, Web Services, Oracle, JUnit, jQuery, XSLT, DHTML, WSDL, Jakarta TOMCAT Servlet Engine, ECLiPSe, XSL, SQL, SOAP, Object Oriented Analysis/Design, JavaServer Faces, Java Messaging Service, JSON, Stored Procedures, SDLC, Oracle PL/SQL, Oracle 9i, MVC, Log4j, LDAP, JNDI, CVS, Ant, XHTML, UNIX, UML/OMT, Oracle 11g, Microsoft SQL Server 2000, JAXB, GUI Applications, Data Access Object, DOJO, DML, Apache Maven. So far Ashok has not gained any managerial experience.
